alert.note: Alert for Ripley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 1:38PM EDT until July 06 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT FOR RIPLEY COUNTY... At 138 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Osgood, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Versailles, Milan, Osgood, Holton, Napoleon, Millhousen, Rexville, Benham, New Marion, Friendship, Versailles Lake, Cross Plains, Otter Village and Olean. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
